text: Rafael Razimovich Kadyrov (; April 4, 1969 — January 19, 2017) was a Russian ice hockey referee. Chief Justice of the Russian Higher Hockey League from season 1998/99. September 8, 2016, Kadyrov played his 700th match in the championships of Russia, becoming the second hockey referee, who have achieved this result.Судья КХЛ Рафаэль Кадыров ушел из жизни в возрасте 47 лет In matches KHL worked since the league base.Скончался хоккейный арбитр Рафаэль Кадыров Rafael Kadyrov served Kontinental Hockey League All-Star Game in 2016,Судья КХЛ Рафаэль Кадыров скончался на 48-м году жизни two adult world championships, six youth and junior world championships. In October 2016 Kadyrov was diagnosed — a brain tumor — astrocytoma of the third degree.‍Скончался арбитр КХЛ Рафаэль Кадыров He died in January 2017 .Ушёл из жизни судья Рафаэль Кадыров == References == ==External links== *KHL Profile * Sportbox Profile * Кадыров и Кулёв держат марку Category:1969 births Category:2017 deaths Category:People from Ufa Category:Russian ice hockey officials Category:Deaths from brain tumor Category:Deaths from cancer in Russia
title: Rafael Kadyrov
